metadata.title: CVE-2024-27024 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/rds: fix WARNING in rds_conn_connect_if_down If connection isn'testablished yet, get_mr() will fail, trigger connection after get_mr().

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-27024` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-20-generic - 6.8.0-20.20
